version_description:
• All new version replaces the SCE Outages app.
• View and pay your bill online
• Track your usage
• View outages
• Report outages
• View outage status updates

• Improved performance
• Access to all sce.com features
• Now available to all account types

The first release of the redesigned MySCE app allows you to quickly and easily pay your bill online, or see your billing history. You can also report an outage, whether it’s your home or office, or if you see a streetlight that’s out.

Features include:
•Pay your bill online.
•Let the app notify you when your bill is ready.
•View 13 months of your billing history.
•Report an outage.
•Sign up for outage notifications.
This version contains critical bug fixes, fixes to login issues, and other performance improvements.
